analysis.description:
TokenDestructible.destroy (/unique_chucks/3/0x25caf15e1cc43e7bfa9853a68de463bfb0d27021.sol#161-174) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,balance) (/unique_chucks/3/0x25caf15e1cc43e7bfa9853a68de463bfb0d27021.sol#172)

IndividualLockableToken.setReleaseTime (/unique_chucks/3/0x25caf15e1cc43e7bfa9853a68de463bfb0d27021.sol#436-453) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_release_time >= block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/3/0x25caf15e1cc43e7bfa9853a68de463bfb0d27021.sol#442-444)

IndividualLockableToken.getLockedBalance (/unique_chucks/3/0x25caf15e1cc43e7bfa9853a68de463bfb0d27021.sol#533-545) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp >= userLock[_holder].release_time (/unique_chucks/3/0x25caf15e1cc43e7bfa9853a68de463bfb0d27021.sol#540-542)

IndividualLockableToken.getFreeBalance (/unique_chucks/3/0x25caf15e1cc43e7bfa9853a68de463bfb0d27021.sol#547-561) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp >= userLock[_holder].release_time (/unique_chucks/3/0x25caf15e1cc43e7bfa9853a68de463bfb0d27021.sol#554-555)
IndividualLockableToken.lock_period should be constant (/unique_chucks/3/0x25caf15e1cc43e7bfa9853a68de463bfb0d27021.sol#429-431)
